mapper.select: SELECT tlj.tlj_name, dwd.dwd_name, xd.xd_name, cz.* FROM mro_chezhan cz, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_tieluju tlj, mro_xianduan xd WHERE tlj.id = dwd.tlj_dwd_id AND dwd.id = xd.dwd_xd_id AND xd.id = cz.xd_cz_id
mapper.delete:
delete from mro_chezhan where cid in
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT tlj.tid, tlj.tlj_id, tlj.tlj_name, tlj.tlj_miaoshu, dwd.did, dwd.dwd_id, dwd.dwd_name, dwd.dwd_miaoshu, dwd.dwd_state, xd.xid, xd.xd_id, xd.xd_name, xd.xd_state, xd.xd_miaoshu, cz.cid, cz.cz_id, cz.xd_id, cz.xd_cz_id, cz.cz_name, cz.cz_name_jiancheng, cz.cz_ip, cz.xt_type, cz.cz_type, cz.cz_lianjie_type, cz.cz_stutrs, cz.cz_open_stutrs, cz.cz_caozuo, cz.cz_lasttime, cz.cz_duantou, cz.cz_miaoshu, cz.cz_state, cz.cz_dmh_state, cz.cz_r_shebei, cz.cz_zhongjizhan, cz.tongXinBianMaGuiDaoNumber, cz.tongXinBianMaZhanNeiOneGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianOneToOneGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianNToOneGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianNToOneSheBeiNumber, cz.tongXinBianMaDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber, cz.jiDianNToOneDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber, cz.jiDianJiaShiGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianJiaShiDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber, cz.jiDianDianMaHuaNumber, cz.publicMessage, cz.yuliushebei1, cz.yuliushebei2, cz.yuliushebei3, cz.yuliushebei4, cz.quJianBiSaiType, cz.linzhan1ID, cz.linzhan1Name, cz.linzhan1LineType, cz.linzhan1OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan1IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan2ID, cz.linzhan2Name, cz.linzhan2LineType, cz.linzhan2OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan2IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan3ID, cz.linzhan3Name, cz.linzhan3LineType, cz.linzhan3OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan3IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan4ID, cz.linzhan4Name, cz.linzhan4LineType, cz.linzhan4OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan4IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan5ID, cz.linzhan5Name, cz.linzhan5LineType, cz.linzhan5OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan5IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan6ID, cz.linzhan6Name, cz.linzhan6LineType, cz.linzhan6OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan6IsNoBenDWD FROM mro_tieluju tlj, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_xianduan xd, mro_chezhan cz WHERE tlj.tid = dwd.tlj_dwd_id AND dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND xd.xid = cz.xd_cz_id ORDER BY cz.cz_id

SELECT tlj.tid, tlj.tlj_id, tlj.tlj_name, tlj.tlj_miaoshu, dwd.did, dwd.dwd_id, dwd.dwd_name, dwd.dwd_miaoshu, dwd.dwd_state, xd.xid, xd.xd_id, xd.xd_name, xd.xd_state, xd.xd_miaoshu, cz.cid, cz.cz_id, cz.xd_id, cz.xd_cz_id, cz.cz_name, cz.cz_name_jiancheng, cz.cz_ip, cz.xt_type, cz.cz_type, cz.cz_lianjie_type, cz.cz_stutrs, cz.cz_open_stutrs, cz.cz_caozuo, cz.cz_lasttime, cz.cz_duantou, cz.cz_miaoshu, cz.cz_state, cz.cz_dmh_state, cz.cz_r_shebei, cz.cz_zhongjizhan, cz.tongXinBianMaGuiDaoNumber, cz.tongXinBianMaZhanNeiOneGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianOneToOneGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianNToOneGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianNToOneSheBeiNumber, cz.tongXinBianMaDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber, cz.jiDianNToOneDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber, cz.jiDianJiaShiGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianJiaShiDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber, cz.jiDianDianMaHuaNumber, cz.publicMessage, cz.yuliushebei1, cz.yuliushebei2, cz.yuliushebei3, cz.yuliushebei4, cz.quJianBiSaiType, cz.linzhan1ID, cz.linzhan1Name, cz.linzhan1LineType, cz.linzhan1OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan1IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan2ID, cz.linzhan2Name, cz.linzhan2LineType, cz.linzhan2OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan2IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan3ID, cz.linzhan3Name, cz.linzhan3LineType, cz.linzhan3OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan3IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan4ID, cz.linzhan4Name, cz.linzhan4LineType, cz.linzhan4OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan4IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan5ID, cz.linzhan5Name, cz.linzhan5LineType, cz.linzhan5OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan5IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan6ID, cz.linzhan6Name, cz.linzhan6LineType, cz.linzhan6OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan6IsNoBenDWD FROM mro_tieluju tlj, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_xianduan xd, mro_chezhan cz WHERE tlj.tid = dwd.tlj_dwd_id AND dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND xd.xid = cz.xd_cz_id AND tlj.tid = #{tid}

SELECT tlj.tid, tlj.tlj_id, tlj.tlj_name, tlj.tlj_miaoshu, dwd.did, dwd.dwd_id, dwd.dwd_name, dwd.dwd_miaoshu, dwd.dwd_state, xd.xid, xd.xd_id, xd.xd_name, xd.xd_state, xd.xd_miaoshu, cz.cid, cz.cz_id, cz.xd_id, cz.xd_cz_id, cz.cz_name, cz.cz_name_jiancheng, cz.cz_ip, cz.cz_type, cz.xt_type, cz.cz_lianjie_type, cz.cz_stutrs, cz.cz_open_stutrs, cz.cz_caozuo, cz.cz_lasttime, cz.cz_duantou, cz.cz_miaoshu, cz.cz_state, cz.cz_dmh_state, cz.cz_r_shebei, cz.cz_zhongjizhan, cz.tongXinBianMaGuiDaoNumber, cz.tongXinBianMaZhanNeiOneGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianOneToOneGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianNToOneGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianNToOneSheBeiNumber, cz.tongXinBianMaDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber, cz.jiDianNToOneDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber, cz.jiDianJiaShiGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianJiaShiDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber, cz.jiDianDianMaHuaNumber, cz.publicMessage, cz.yuliushebei1, cz.yuliushebei2, cz.yuliushebei3, cz.yuliushebei4, cz.quJianBiSaiType, cz.linzhan1ID, cz.linzhan1Name, cz.linzhan1LineType, cz.linzhan1OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan1IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan2ID, cz.linzhan2Name, cz.linzhan2LineType, cz.linzhan2OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan2IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan3ID, cz.linzhan3Name, cz.linzhan3LineType, cz.linzhan3OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan3IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan4ID, cz.linzhan4Name, cz.linzhan4LineType, cz.linzhan4OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan4IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan5ID, cz.linzhan5Name, cz.linzhan5LineType, cz.linzhan5OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan5IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan6ID, cz.linzhan6Name, cz.linzhan6LineType, cz.linzhan6OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan6IsNoBenDWD FROM mro_tieluju tlj, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_xianduan xd, mro_chezhan cz WHERE tlj.tid = dwd.tlj_dwd_id AND dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND xd.xid = cz.xd_cz_id AND dwd.did = #{did}

SELECT tlj.tid, tlj.tlj_id, tlj.tlj_name, tlj.tlj_miaoshu, dwd.did, dwd.dwd_id, dwd.dwd_name, dwd.dwd_miaoshu, dwd.dwd_state, xd.xid, xd.xd_id, xd.xd_name, xd.xd_state, xd.xd_miaoshu, cz.cid, cz.cz_id, cz.xd_id, cz.xd_cz_id, cz.cz_name, cz.cz_name_jiancheng, cz.cz_ip, cz.xt_type, cz.cz_type, cz.cz_lianjie_type, cz.cz_stutrs, cz.cz_open_stutrs, cz.cz_caozuo, cz.cz_lasttime, cz.cz_duantou, cz.cz_miaoshu, cz.cz_state, cz.cz_dmh_state, cz.cz_r_shebei, cz.cz_zhongjizhan, cz.tongXinBianMaGuiDaoNumber, cz.tongXinBianMaZhanNeiOneGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianOneToOneGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianNToOneGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianNToOneSheBeiNumber, cz.tongXinBianMaDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber, cz.jiDianNToOneDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber, cz.jiDianJiaShiGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianJiaShiDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber, cz.jiDianDianMaHuaNumber, cz.publicMessage, cz.yuliushebei1, cz.yuliushebei2, cz.yuliushebei3, cz.yuliushebei4, cz.quJianBiSaiType, cz.linzhan1ID, cz.linzhan1Name, cz.linzhan1LineType, cz.linzhan1OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan1IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan2ID, cz.linzhan2Name, cz.linzhan2LineType, cz.linzhan2OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan2IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan3ID, cz.linzhan3Name, cz.linzhan3LineType, cz.linzhan3OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan3IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan4ID, cz.linzhan4Name, cz.linzhan4LineType, cz.linzhan4OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan4IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan5ID, cz.linzhan5Name, cz.linzhan5LineType, cz.linzhan5OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan5IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan6ID, cz.linzhan6Name, cz.linzhan6LineType, cz.linzhan6OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan6IsNoBenDWD FROM mro_tieluju tlj, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_xianduan xd, mro_chezhan cz WHERE tlj.tid = dwd.tlj_dwd_id AND dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND xd.xid = cz.xd_cz_id AND xd.xid = #{xid}

SELECT tlj.tid, tlj.tlj_id, tlj.tlj_name, tlj.tlj_miaoshu, dwd.did, dwd.dwd_id, dwd.dwd_name, dwd.dwd_miaoshu, dwd.dwd_state, xd.xid, xd.xd_id, xd.xd_name, xd.xd_state, xd.xd_miaoshu, cz.cid, cz.cz_id, cz.xd_id, cz.xd_cz_id, cz.cz_name, cz.cz_name_jiancheng, cz.cz_ip, cz.cz_type, cz.xt_type, cz.cz_lianjie_type, cz.cz_stutrs, cz.cz_open_stutrs, cz.cz_caozuo, cz.cz_lasttime, cz.cz_duantou, cz.cz_miaoshu, cz.cz_state, cz.cz_dmh_state, cz.cz_r_shebei, cz.cz_zhongjizhan, cz.tongXinBianMaGuiDaoNumber, cz.tongXinBianMaZhanNeiOneGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianOneToOneGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianNToOneGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianNToOneSheBeiNumber, cz.tongXinBianMaDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber, cz.jiDianNToOneDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber, cz.jiDianJiaShiGuiDaoNumber, cz.jiDianJiaShiDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber, cz.jiDianDianMaHuaNumber, cz.publicMessage, cz.yuliushebei1, cz.yuliushebei2, cz.yuliushebei3, cz.yuliushebei4, cz.quJianBiSaiType, cz.linzhan1ID, cz.linzhan1Name, cz.linzhan1LineType, cz.linzhan1OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan1IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan2ID, cz.linzhan2Name, cz.linzhan2LineType, cz.linzhan2OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan2IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan3ID, cz.linzhan3Name, cz.linzhan3LineType, cz.linzhan3OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan3IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan4ID, cz.linzhan4Name, cz.linzhan4LineType, cz.linzhan4OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan4IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan5ID, cz.linzhan5Name, cz.linzhan5LineType, cz.linzhan5OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan5IsNoBenDWD, cz.linzhan6ID, cz.linzhan6Name, cz.linzhan6LineType, cz.linzhan6OfXianDuan, cz.linzhan6IsNoBenDWD FROM mro_tieluju tlj, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_xianduan xd, mro_chezhan cz WHERE tlj.tid = dwd.tlj_dwd_id AND dwd.did = xd.dwd_xd_id AND xd.xid = cz.xd_cz_id AND cz.cid = #{cid}
SELECT tlj.tid, tlj.tlj_name FROM mro_tieluju tlj GROUP BY tlj_id
SELECT did, dwd_name FROM mro_dianwuduan WHERE tlj_dwd_id = #{tid}
SELECT did, dwd_name FROM mro_dianwuduan
SELECT xid, xd_name FROM mro_xianduan WHERE dwd_xd_id = #{did}
SELECT cid, cz_id, cz_name FROM mro_chezhan WHERE xd_cz_id = #{xid}
SELECT cz.cz_name, xd.xd_name, qb.* FROM mro_quduan_base qb, mro_xianduan xd, mro_chezhan cz WHERE qb.cid = cz.cid AND qb.xid = xd.xid AND line != '电码化'

SELECT tlj.tid, dwd.did, xd.xid, tlj.tlj_name, dwd.dwd_name, dwd.dwd_miaoshu, xd.xd_name FROM mro_tieluju tlj, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_xianduan xd WHERE tlj.tid = dwd.tlj_dwd_id and xd.dwd_xd_id=dwd.did

SELECT tlj.tid, dwd.did, xd.xid, cz.cid, tlj.tlj_name, dwd.dwd_name, xd.xd_name, cz.cz_name, xd.xd_miaoshu FROM mro_tieluju tlj, mro_dianwuduan dwd, mro_xianduan xd, mro_chezhan cz WHERE tlj.tid = dwd.tlj_dwd_id AND xd.dwd_xd_id = dwd.did AND cz.xd_cz_id = xd.xid
